Description:
To whom it may concern,

Hi, we are trying to update our Endpoint protector server to the latest version, I received an error message: " Please Contact Support. (ERROR: 2 - Number of maximum retries for this update reached, skipping this update...)". I believe this may be related to not having the correct whitelisted IPs/ports for downloading the update. Please share the list of IPs/ports required to download this patch.

Regards,
Swami Purnamsha
Solution_Comment__c: CUstoemr confirmed this can be closed.
